author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

It has been suggested that for phase-2 IT geometry development it might be quicker to use fake CPE conditions as opposed to using  to meta-`GlobalTag`s from `autoCondPhase2`.
One of the shortcoming of the current `SiPixelFakeLorentzAngleESSource` is that it has one unique hard-coded value for the H for all `DetId`s. This overcome in this PR.
Profited of the PR to introduce unit tests.

#### PR validation:

Run the unit tests.
